text: But not one of his nimble-fingered best. GERMANY'S Russ Conway is a pianist who calls himself CRAZY OTTO. But nothing crazy about his pianistics. He pounds merrily away at a piece called "Piccadilly (Polydor). I find it cute. American pianist Floyd Cramer, who played for Elvis on "It's Now or Never, looks like having a success on his own with "On the Rebound' (RCA).
handwritten_text: But not one of his nimble-fingered best. GERMANY'S Russ Conway is a pianist who calls himself CRAZY OTTO. But nothing crazy about his pianistics. He pounds merrily away at a piece called "Piccadilly (Polydor). I find it cute. American pianist Floyd Cramer, who played for Elvis on "It's Now or Never, looks like having a success on his own with "On the Rebound' (RCA).
